name: Firefox - Spacious Blue Library
description:
A dark blue theme that is imitative of the Firefox web developer tools visual style.

It affects the Library / Places page ( chrome://browser/content/places/places.xul ) and the bookmarks sidebar.

Made in Windows 7 (Aero disabled), so I don't know how it will look on other operating systems.
additional_info:
Folder icons have been removed. Folders containing a folder will have a blue pointer. [ places library bookmark bookmarks blue dark ] 2013-11-07
  • Fixes for Firefox 25 - removal of borders and shadows.
2013-10-08

2013-04-04
  • Added rudimentary support for the Downloads area, by removing white pane (as seen in Firefox 20).
2013-03-20
  • Changed scrollbar appearance.
  • Added colored state to column sorter when active.
2012-12-01
  • Fixed misplaced bolding of menus.
  • Added box shadows to blue triangles on hover.
